idea:
ARVI enterprises is one of the leading private sector company deals in photo copier machine’s & CCTV cameras all over Mumbai-Maharashtra. It was established in year 2006. ARVI enterprises provides services in Government & private sectors, which are strategically located all over Mumbai & Maharashtra.
We are authorised dealers of SHARP Business (India) Pvt. Ltd. For SHARP range of Office Equipment. We are authorised dealers for Konica Minolta Pvt ltd, Samsung India Ltd. As we were involved in maintenance of office equipment since 2006, We can assure you a top class after-sales-service from us.
ARVI enterprises character has been formed over nearly 4 years of doing business in the field of telecommunication & providing office automation solutions. We never lost sight of the importance of putting the needs of his customers and the public first. We look forward to a bright and shining technological future, and to playing a leading role in the digitally networked society, propelled by the creativity and dedication of our employees. We are dedicated to every client’s success. We believe in Innovation that matters – for our company and for our clients, Trust and personal responsibility in all relationships.
As a company, and as individuals, we value integrity, honesty, openness, personal excellence, constructive self-criticism, continual self-improvement, and mutual respect. We are committed to our customers and partners and have a passion for technology. We take on big challenges, and pride ourselves on seeing them through. We hold ourselves accountable to our customers, partners, and employees by honoring our commitments, providing results, and striving for the highest quality
name: ARVI ENTERPRISES

idea: We are technology led and solution oriented Investment Banking advisory firm which facilitate customised and unique solutions for corporates for managing their growth well. Our advise and solutions are structured to make it more efficient in terms of the medium of communication.
name: PARETO CAPITAL FINANCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: DOMA is a unique platform-based business that leverages Brand, Services and Technology to unlock value in the extremely large residential real estate asset class by providing world class services to both the client side (residential real estate owner) and the customers (users of the real estate asset). DOMA operates on the business fundamental that incredible business value is trapped in residential real estate in India that can be released by making the asset class highly productive and valuable. There is a clear urban phenomenon that ownership of asset and utilization of asset is separating as a psychographic trend. The modern urban consumer who is always on the move does not want to be constrained by location and is preferring homes which offer a certain lifestyle. Through DOMA’s homes that will be designed for comfort and convenience, consumers will subscribe into a Lifestyle with an experience unlike any other and not just any average rented space. Our offerings are designed to delight the urban consumer and intend to make ‘living without owning’ the asset much more desirable.
name: MULTI-LIVING TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are pleased to introduce ourselves as one of the leading manufacturer, exporter, stockiest and supplier of below mentioned items required for Oil & Gas, Onshore, Offshore, Petrochemicals, Fertilizers, Power, Cement, Water Treatment & Pipeline Projects.
We have been certified by ISO 9001:2015 which demonstrates our commitment to provide quality services to our valued clients.
Below Products are manufactured by us
1) Instrument Tube Fittings.
2) Pipe Fittings (Threaded, Socket weld).
3) 2-way, 3-way, 5-way Manifold Valve (Flat type, Angle type, T-type, H-type).
4) Ball Valves. (Round body, Flat body, Panel mounting).
5) Needle valve.
6) Globe & Gate valve (Miniature Pattern).
7) Condensate Pots.
8) Instrument Air Manifold.
9) Pipes & Tubes. (Supply).
name: ULTIMATE OILFIELD EQUIPMENTS
